name: Alien Crash
description:
My first mobile friendly game! This was just a quick college assignment made in a day to create an Infinite Runner game on Construct 2. All assets used are from Kenney Game Assets.

Currently there is a bug where the first time you start the game, you need to tap again for the player to start running and for the score to start counting. This is a conflict with the touch and keyboard controls, I'll fix it in the near future. I will implement the animations for the player in the pack as well.
